verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is he who considers <WH7919> the poor. <WH1800> Yahweh <WH3068> will deliver <WH4422> him in the day <WH3117> of evil. <WH7451>

Yahweh <WH3068> will preserve <WH8104> him, <WH2421> and keep him alive. He shall be blessed <WH833> on the earth, <WH776> and he will not surrender <WH5414> him to the will <WH5315> of his enemies. <WH341>
Yahweh <WH3068> will sustain <WH5582> him on his sickbed, <WH6210> <WH1741> and restore <WH2015> him from his bed <WH6210> of illness. <WH2483>
I said, <WH559> "Yahweh, <WH3068> have mercy <WH2603> on me! <WH7495> Heal me, <WH5315> for I have sinned against you. <WH2398>"
My enemies <WH341> speak <WH559> evil <WH7451> against me: <WH4191> "When will he die, and his name <WH8034> perish? <WH6>"

If he comes <WH935> to see <WH7200> me, <WH1696> he speaks falsehood. <WH7723> His heart <WH3820> gathers <WH6908> iniquity <WH205> to itself. <WH3318> When he goes abroad, <WH2351> he tells it. <WH1696>
All who hate <WH8130> me whisper <WH3907> together <WH3162> against me. <WH2803> They imagine the worst for me. <WH7451>
"An evil <WH1100> disease, <WH1697>" they say, <WH3332> "has afflicted him. <WH7901> Now that he lies he shall rise up <WH6965> no more. <WH3254>"
Yes, <WH7965> my own familiar friend, <WH376> in whom I trusted, <WH982> who ate <WH398> bread <WH3899> with me, <WH1431> has lifted up his heel against me. <WH6119>
But you, <WH3068> Yahweh, have mercy <WH2603> on me, <WH6965> and raise me up, that I may repay them. <WH7999>
By this I know <WH3045> that you delight <WH2654> in me, <WH341> because my enemy doesn't <WH7321> triumph over me.
As for me, <WH8551> you uphold me in my integrity, <WH8537> and set <WH5324> me in your presence <WH6440> forever. <WH5769>
Blessed <WH1288> be Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> from everlasting <WH5769> and to everlasting! <WH5769> Amen <WH543> and amen. <WH543>
